Certainly! Here are two horror movies that you might enjoy:

1. The Conjuring (2013)
This movie is based on the book by Clive Barker called "The Demon Collection". In this movie, the audience witnesses the famous case of the demonic haunting of the Amityville family.

2. Get Out (2017)
"Get Out" is a horror film directed by Jordan Peele. The story takes place in a wealthy suburban neighborhood, where a young black man named Chris Parker finds himself trapped inside his own home after he has been held captive by four strangers who have claimed that they are the descendants of the original slave owners of the plantation where Chris and his family live.

I hope these recommendations help you explore the horror genre.

Based on their interest in adventure, I would recommend the following two movies from the list:

1. Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981): This classic film follows archaeologist Indiana Jones as he tries to find a lost city of gold. Along the way, he encounters various obstacles and challenges.

2. King Kong (1933): In this classic film, a giant gorilla named Kong attacks a ship full of people. Captain Jack Driscoll (played by Charles Laughton) is the leader of the ship's passengers. Together with Driscoll, they must work together to escape from Kong and make it back to civilization.

Both Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark and King Kong are classic adventure films that many people enjoy watching.
